body: What the story is dark? I am not surprised that this turned dark. Considering this is from ancient times when there's still Royalty, Warlords, Monarchs, Dynasties and Empires. This should be pretty common as status is very important and emphasized in that time period. Abuse of position is going to be common since Human Rights wasn't really a thing in that time period.
What is there left? The girl will name her child the old lover's name while he is beheaded?
this is not complete and the finale of this story is dark
How is this an after? All these pages are from part 2
